review: I am giving the product 3 stars in that I was lead to believe it did more than it actually does.  It also does not ship right away.  It took almost 2 weeks for mine to arrive, but it did come preloaded with my Amazon Prime information.  What I am most upset about is that my cable provider (Charter Communications) does not support HBOGo, History Channel, and a few other channels that are touted in the description.  Apparently there are several cable providers that don't support channels being played on the Fire TV.  Amazon's response is for me to contact Charter and let them know that I want that option.  How exactly do I do that?  I do like being able to watch YouTube & Netflix, but I can also do this with most BluRay players on the market.  The HBOGo was what set this apart. With out that it isn't worth it.
author: T. Schulte
